00075 TFile *openRootFile(const char *filename) 
00076 {
00077         closeSource();
00078 
00079         r_file = new TFile(filename);
00080         if ( r_file->IsZombie() )
00081         {
00082                 printf("***ERROR! Cannot open ROOT file [%s]\n",filename);
00083                 delete r_file;
00084                 r_file = NULL;
00085 #if 0
00086                 r_folder = NULL;
00087 #endif
00088                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_FILE;
00089         }
00090 #if 0
00091         else 
00092         {
00093                 // *** get top folder ***
00094                 r_file->GetObject("histos",r_folder);
00095                 if ( !r_folder )
00096                 {      
00097                         printf("**ERROR! Cannot load folder 'histos' from file [%filename]\n",filename);
00098                         delete r_file;
00099                         r_file = NULL;
00100                         r_folder = NULL;  
00101                         gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_FOLDER;
00102                 }
00103                 else
00104                 {
00105                         r_folder->SetOwner( kTRUE );
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 #endif
00109 
00110         printf("Connected to source file :[%s]\n",filename);
00111 
00112         return r_file;
00113 }

00124 TSocket *openSocket(const char *hostname, const int port_nr)
00125 {
00126         Int_t status;
00127 
00128         closeSource();
00129 
00130         r_socket = new TSocket(hostname, port_nr);
00131 
00132         if ( ! r_socket->IsValid()  ) 
00133         {
00134                 delete r_socket;
00135                 r_socket = NULL;
00136                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00137                 return r_socket;
00138         }
00139 
00140         char str[64];
00141         sprintf(str,"ERROR");
00142         status = r_socket->Select(TSocket::kRead,timeout);
00143         if ( status == 1 ) 
00144         {
00145                 r_socket->Recv(str, sizeof(str));
00146                 if ( strncmp(str, "RMSERV", 6) != 0 ) 
00147                 {
00148                         // *** incorrect responce from the server ***
00149                         printf("***ERROR! Unexpected response from the server [%s] on port %i: [%s]",hostname,port_nr,str);
00150                         r_socket->Close();
00151                         delete r_socket;
00152                         r_socket = NULL;
00153                         gl_status = RDISP_ERR_BAD_RESPONSE;
00154                         return r_socket;
00155                 }      
00156         }
00157         else
00158         {
00159                 // *** no response from the server ***
00160                 printf("***ERROR! No response from the server [%s] on port %i\n",hostname, port_nr);
00161                 r_socket->Close();
00162                 delete r_socket;
00163                 r_socket = NULL;
00164                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_RESPONSE;
00165                 return r_socket;
00166         }
00167 
00168         printf("Successfully connected to server on host [%s] port %i\n",hostname,port_nr);
00169         gl_status = 0;
00170 
00171         return r_socket;
00172 }
00173 
00178 void closeSource()
00179 {
00180         if (r_socket != NULL) 
00181         {
00182                 r_socket->Close(); 
00183                 delete r_socket;
00184                 r_socket = NULL;
00185         }
00186 
00187         if (r_file != NULL) 
00188         {
00189 #if 0
00190                 r_folder->Clear();
00191                 delete r_folder;
00192                 r_folder = NULL;
00193 #endif
00194                 r_file->Close("R");
00195                 delete r_file;
00196                 r_file = NULL;
00197         }
00198 
00199         clear_recv_buffer();
00200 }

00202 TObject *getObject(const char *name)
00203 {
00204         if (r_socket != NULL) 
00205         {
00206                 return getObjectFromSocket( name );
00207         } 
00208         else if (r_file != NULL) 
00209         {
00210                 return getObjectFromFile( name );
00211         } 
00212 
00214         if ( gl_status == 0 )
00215         {
00216                 printf("No connection\n");
00217                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_SOURCE;
00218         }
00219         return NULL;
00220 }

00243 TObject *getObjectFromSocket(const char *name)
00244 {
00245         TMessage *m;
00246         char str[256];
00247         TObject *obj;
00248 
00249         if ( strlen(name) > 230 )
00250         {
00251                 printf("***ERROR! Best object name\n"); 
00252                 return NULL;
00253         }
00254 
00255         if ( ! folder ) 
00256         {
00257                 folder = new TFolder("heap","heap");
00258                 folder->SetOwner( kTRUE );
00259         }
00260 
00261         sprintf(str, "GET %s", name);
00262 
00263         // make sure that the socket is alive
00264         Int_t status = r_socket->Select(TSocket::kWrite,timeout);
00265         if ( status != 1 )
00266         {
00267                 printf("***ERROR! Broken connection to socket\n");
00268                 closeSource();
00269                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00270                 return NULL;
00271         }
00272         r_socket->Send(str);
00273 
00274         // receive reply from server
00275         //printf("Trying socket...\n");
00276         status = r_socket->Select(TSocket::kRead,timeout);
00277         if ( status != 1 )
00278         {
00279                 printf("***ERROR! Broken connection to socket\n");
00280                 closeSource();
00281                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00282                 return NULL;
00283         }
00284         //printf("Alive!\n");
00285         Int_t n = r_socket->Recv(m);
00286 
00287         if ( n <= 0 )
00288         {
00289                 printf("***ERROR! Broken pipe\n");
00290                 closeSource();
00291                 gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00292                 return NULL;
00293         }
00294 
00295         obj = (TObject*)m->ReadObject(m->GetClass());
00296 
00297         if (obj == 0) 
00298         {
00299                 printf("Unable to get object [%s] from socket\n", name);
00300         }
00301         else
00302         {
00303                 folder->Add( obj );
00304         }
00305 
00306         delete m;
00307 
00308         return obj;
00309 }

00365 void clear_recv_buffer()
00366 {
00367         if (folder) folder->Clear();
00368 }
00369 
00377 int get_status_code()
00378 {
00379         switch ( gl_status )
00380         {
00381                 case 0:
00382                         // no error
00383                         break;
00384                 case RDISP_ERR_NO_CON:
00385                         printf("No connection to remote server\n");
00386                         break;
00387                 case RDISP_ERR_BAD_RESPONSE:
00388                         printf("Bad response from the server\n");
00389                         break;
00390                 case RDISP_ERR_NO_RESPONSE:
00391                         printf("No response from the server\n");
00392                         break;
00393                 case RDISP_ERR_NO_SOURCE:
00394                         printf("No sources opened\n");
00395                         break;
00396                 case RDISP_ERR_BROKEN_PIPE:
00397                         printf("Broken pipe\n");
00398                         break;
00399                 case RDISP_ERR_NO_FILE:
00400                         printf("Cannot open ROOT file\n");
00401                         break;
00402                 case RDISP_ERR_NO_FOLDER:
00403                         printf("Cannot load root folder from the ROOT file\n");
00404                         break;
00405                 default:
00406                         printf("Unknown error\n");
00407                         break;
00408         }
00409 
00410         return gl_status;
00411 }

00418 void reset_error_code()
00419 {
00420         gl_status = 0;
00421 }

00426 ULong_t get_run_number()
00427 {
00428 
00429         ULong_t run_nr = 0;
00430 
00431         if (r_socket != NULL) 
00432         {
00433                 TMessage *m;
00434                 char str[256];
00435 
00436                 sprintf(str, "GetRunNumber");
00437                 Int_t status = r_socket->Select(TSocket::kWrite,timeout);
00438                 if ( status != 1 )
00439                 {
00440                         printf("***ERROR! Broken connection to socket\n");
00441                         closeSource();
00442                         gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00443                         return 0;
00444                 }
00445                 r_socket->Send(str);
00446 
00447                 status = r_socket->Select(TSocket::kRead,timeout);
00448                 if ( status != 1 )
00449                 {
00450                         printf("***ERROR! Broken connection to socket\n");
00451                         closeSource();
00452                         gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00453                         return 0;
00454                 }
00455                 Int_t n = r_socket->Recv(m);
00456 
00457                 if ( n <= 0 )
00458                 {
00459                         printf("***ERROR! Broken pipe\n");
00460                         closeSource();
00461                         gl_status = RDISP_ERR_NO_CON;
00462                         return 0;
00463                 }
00464                 m->ReadULong( run_nr );
00465 
00466                 delete m;
00467 
00468         }
00469         else if ( r_file != NULL) 
00470         {
00471                 TH1I *h1 = (TH1I*)getObjectFromFile( "run_number/h1_run_number" );
00472                 if ( h1 )
00473                 {
00474                         run_nr = h1->GetBinContent(1);
00475                 }
00476         }
00477 
00478         return run_nr;
00479
